Room.Name: Training Compound
Room.ShortDescription: You are at a path intersection in the Brownhaven Animal Training Compound.
Room.LongDescription: A white sign post, with several wooden signs nailed to it, points in four directions. To the east is the copper dragon training area, north is the pegasus grounds, and south takes you to the administration building. To the west is the gate where you may go out to the road.
